website_summaries.verdict: This set's interchangeable pilot gives you versatility that fixed sets do not. They work great with either wood or metal.
pros: 21-piece, high speed steel,  interchangeable pilot counterbore set
cons: Pilot shanks are a loose fit

customer_reviews.title: machining quality not great
customer_reviews.text: quality here is dubious. I dont see any markings but I suspect they are made in a certain populous country in the far east. I had to drill out the bit holder to fit the individual bits. It was a couple thousandths too tight and they wouldn't fit. Also the fit between the pilot shafts and the cutters is sloppy and could allow for eccentric holes. I have not tried them on any materials of significant quality - i.e. steels, but I am not optimistic. I'd search the auction sites for a used set of american made pilot bits.
customer_reviews.author: T. Vik

customer_reviews.title: Rust and bad threads
customer_reviews.text: It was rusty inside and the set screw to hold the guide wouldn’t screw in far enough to actually hold the guide in place. Either the threads weren’t fully cut, or perhaps the rust fouled up the threads. Trying to screw the set screw in, far enough to engage with the guide, resulted in the screw becoming irretrievable bound. Aside from that the guides, bits and holder seemed to be of acceptable quality but I didn’t get to use them to cut anything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good, cheap, but not perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Good price, but the grub (or set) screws on mine were crappy, and were easily replaced, though! Also the pilot guide shaft was a bit short on the 1/4" pilot. Others were about 1/4" longer. Odd! It was difficult to get that pilot to stay in the holder while drilling in a drill press. That being said, for an inexpensive set for the casual hobbyist user, it is a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Alex M

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: The bits are nice and cut through Aluminium just great. Love the mix and match pilots and cutters.
customer_reviews.author: HS

customer_reviews.title: The tools are nice, but the grubscrew and hex wrench sucked
customer_reviews.text: The tools are nice, but the grubscrew and hex wrench sucked After replacing them, the tools work fine
customer_reviews.author: Mike Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Verisatle but cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: I like the ability to interchange pilots and cutters but it is clear that this is a cheap tool with cheap tool problems.
customer_reviews.author: nellie

customer_reviews.title: The cutter broke on first use.
customer_reviews.text: The small cutter broke on the first use, on aluminum. It shattered into peaces. Have not tried the larger cutters at this time.
customer_reviews.author: elton bull

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. The counterbore cutters will not fit in the holder and the pilot shanks are a very loose fit in both the cutters and the holder. So even if the cutters could be made to fit the holder (I reasonably expected them to do so out of the box) there is no way these will cut a true concentric counterbore.
customer_reviews.author: VMcM

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: One of the bits was missing when opened. And definitely a cheap product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Used the tools several time now.. well made and no issues..
customer_reviews.author: Mj

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good better than expected . Big bang for the buck.thanks
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Gaskill

customer_reviews.title: A very nice set of counterbores
customer_reviews.text: A very nice set of counterbores. They are much nicer than the ones in the product pictures. The grind on the cutters is finer than the picture shows and I am sure they will make nice smooth chatter free bores. The selection of pilots should cover most every fastener I will use.
customer_reviews.author: PHC

product_meta.title: HHIP 2007-0021 21 Piece HSS Interchangeable Pilot Counterbore Set
product_meta.description: 21 Piece High Speed Steel Interchangeable Pilot Counter bore Set ~ Supplied in a fitted case. ~ 14 pilots with a 5/32" shank including 0. 187, 0. 204, 0. 213, 0. 229, 1/4, 17/64, 9/32, 5/16, 21/64, 11/32, 3/8, 25/64, 13/32 and 7/16. ~ 6 counter bores including 5/16, 3/8, 7/16, 1/2, 9/16 and 5/8. ~ 1 Holder with a 3/8" shank. ~ Straight shank. ~ 3 Flute.
